actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide a refundable credit of $30 to any taxpayer who votes in a Federal election.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a $30 ($60 for a joint return) refundable income tax credit to taxpayers who vote in Federal elections. Requires that the taxpayer document such voting.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide a refundable credit of $30 to any taxpayer who votes in a Federal election.
